description: ReverseGeocode converts geographic coordinates into a human-readable address or place. You can obtain address component, and other related information such as place type, category, street information. The Reverse Geocode API supports filtering to on place type so that you can refine result based on your need. Also, The Reverse Geocode API can also provide additional features such as time zone information and the inclusion of political views.

parameters.name: QueryPosition
parameters.description: The position, in [lng, lat] for which you are querying nearby results for. Results closer to the position will be ranked higher then results further away from the position (float) ---

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: A structure which contains a set of inclusion/exclusion properties that results must possess in order to be returned as a result. IncludePlaceTypes (list) --- The included place types. (string) ---

parameters.name: AdditionalFeatures
parameters.description: A list of optional additional parameters, such as time zone that can be requested for each result. (string) ---

parameters.name: IntendedUse
parameters.description: Indicates if the results will be stored. Defaults to SingleUse, if left empty.

nested_items.name: PricingBucket
nested_items.description: The pricing bucket for which the query is charged at.

nested_items.name: ResultItems
nested_items.description: List of places or results returned for a query.

nested_items.name: PlaceId
nested_items.description: The PlaceId of the place you wish to receive the information for.

nested_items.name: PlaceType
nested_items.description: A PlaceType is a category that the result place must belong to.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: The localized display name of this result item based on request parameter language.

nested_items.name: Label
nested_items.description: Assembled address value built out of the address components, according to the regional postal rules. This is the correctly formatted address.

nested_items.name: Code2
nested_items.description: Country, represented by its alpha 2-character code.

nested_items.name: Code3
nested_items.description: Country, represented by its alpha t-character code.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name of the country.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: Abbreviated code for a the state, province or region of the country.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name for a the state, province, or region of the country.

nested_items.name: SubRegion
nested_items.description: The sub-region or county for which results should be present in.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: Abbreviated code for the county or sub-region.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: Name for the county or sub-region.

nested_items.name: Locality
nested_items.description: The city or locality of the address.

nested_items.name: District
nested_items.description: The district or division of a locality associated with this address.

nested_items.name: SubDistrict
nested_items.description: A subdivision of a district.

nested_items.name: PostalCode
nested_items.description: An alphanumeric string included in a postal address to facilitate mail sorting, such as post code, postcode, or ZIP code, for which the result should possess.

nested_items.name: Block
nested_items.description: Name of the block.

nested_items.name: SubBlock
nested_items.description: Name of sub-block.

nested_items.name: Intersection
nested_items.description: Name of the streets in the intersection.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Street
nested_items.description: The name of the street results should be present in.

nested_items.name: StreetComponents
nested_items.description: Components of the street.

nested_items.name: BaseName
nested_items.description: Base name part of the street name.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Street type part of the street name.

nested_items.name: TypePlacement
nested_items.description: Defines if the street type is before or after the base name.

nested_items.name: TypeSeparator
nested_items.description: Defines a separator character such as "" or " " between the base name and type.

nested_items.name: Prefix
nested_items.description: A prefix is a directional identifier that precedes, but is not included in, the base name of a road.

nested_items.name: Suffix
nested_items.description: A suffix is a directional identifier that follows, but is not included in, the base name of a road.

nested_items.name: Direction
nested_items.description: Indicates the official directional identifiers assigned to highways.

nested_items.name: Language
nested_items.description: A BCP 47 compliant language codes for the results to be rendered in. If there is no data for the result in the requested language, data will be returned in the default language for the entry.

nested_items.name: AddressNumber
nested_items.description: The number that identifies an address within a street.

nested_items.name: Building
nested_items.description: The name of the building at the address.

nested_items.name: SecondaryAddressComponents
nested_items.description: Components that correspond to secondary identifiers on an Address. Secondary address components include information such as Suite or Unit Number, Building, or Floor.

nested_items.name: Number
nested_items.description: Number that uniquely identifies a secondary address.

nested_items.name: AddressNumberCorrected
nested_items.description: Boolean indicating if the address provided has been corrected.

nested_items.name: PostalCodeDetails
nested_items.description: Contains details about the postal code of the place/result.

nested_items.name: PostalCode
nested_items.description: An alphanumeric string included in a postal address to facilitate mail sorting, such as post code, postcode, or ZIP code for which the result should possess.

nested_items.name: PostalAuthority
nested_items.description: The postal authority or entity. This could be a governmental authority, a regulatory authority, or a designated postal operator.

nested_items.name: PostalCodeType
nested_items.description: The postal code type.

nested_items.name: ZipClassificationCode
nested_items.description: The ZIP Classification Code, or in other words what type of postal code is it.

nested_items.name: UspsZipPlus4
nested_items.description: The USPS ZIP+4 Record Type Code.

nested_items.name: RecordTypeCode
nested_items.description: The USPS ZIP+4 Record Type Code.

nested_items.name: Position
nested_items.description: The position in longitude and latitude.
(float) ---

nested_items.name: Distance
nested_items.description: The distance in meters from the QueryPosition.

nested_items.name: MapView
nested_items.description: The bounding box enclosing the geometric shape (area or line) that an individual result covers.
(float) ---

nested_items.name: Categories
nested_items.description: Categories of results that results must belong to.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The category ID.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The category name.

nested_items.name: LocalizedName
nested_items.description: Localized name of the category type.

nested_items.name: Primary
nested_items.description: Boolean which indicates if this category is the primary offered by the place.

nested_items.name: FoodTypes
nested_items.description: List of food types offered by this result.

nested_items.name: LocalizedName
nested_items.description: Localized name of the food type.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The Food Type Id.

nested_items.name: Primary
nested_items.description: Boolean which indicates if this food type is the primary offered by the place. For example, if a location serves fast food, but also dessert, he primary would likely be fast food.

nested_items.name: AccessPoints
nested_items.description: Position of the access point represented by longitude and latitude.

nested_items.name: Position
nested_items.description: The position, in longitude and latitude.
(float) ---

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The time zone name.

nested_items.name: Offset
nested_items.description: Time zone offset of the timezone from UTC.

nested_items.name: OffsetSeconds
nested_items.description: The offset of the time zone from UTC, in seconds.

nested_items.name: PoliticalView
nested_items.description: The alpha-2 or alpha-3 character code for the political view of a country. The political view applies to the results of the request to represent unresolved territorial claims through the point of view of the specified country.

nested_items.name: Intersections
nested_items.description: All Intersections that are near the provided address.

nested_items.name: PlaceId
nested_items.description: The PlaceId of the place result.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: The localized display name of this result item based on request parameter language.

nested_items.name: Label
nested_items.description: Assembled address value built out of the address components, according to the regional postal rules. This is the correctly formatted address.
